page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN CHARLBURY
page.content: Most people who live in Charlbury work out of the town.In Charlbury there are about 13 shops.There is one school, a playgroup,and a nursery school.There is also a quarry and a factory. The new Spendlove Centre also offers some employment.Most people work in the shops. There are several farms,a bank,a dairy and a library.Also there are four pubs,two hotels and three estate agents.Services include a Doctor's, surgery,a Dental practice and two Veterinary Surgeons. Wesley Barrell is a factory where furniture such as cupboards,chairs, cabinets,settees and fabrics are made. They use sewing machines,typewriters and other machines.They deliver to shops with a normal delivery lorry or van.The railway allows people to travel out of Charlbury to other jobs in either Oxford or London.
